Uses of Class
baseClasses.Word

  • Packages that use Word 
    Package Description
    baseClasses  
    tools  

    • Uses of Word in baseClasses

      Methods in baseClasses that return types with arguments of type Word 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.ArrayList<Word> Song.getSong() 
      Methods in baseClasses with parameters of type Word 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean Word.equals(Word a)
      this method provides the equal method for the Word class: it compares the literal word contained into the object.

    • Uses of Word in tools

      Methods in tools that return types with arguments of type Word 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static java.util.ArrayList<Word> Utility.compute(java.util.ArrayList<Word> raw)
      this method is used to compute every Word ArrayList: it checks all the objects and modify the equal ones, by increasing their counter, modifying the title and the author fields.
      static java.util.ArrayList<Word> Utility.setID(java.util.ArrayList<Word> a)
      this method establishes an unique ID to every Word object to highlight it and differentiates from each other.
      static java.util.ArrayList<Word> Utility.songList(java.util.ArrayList<Word> raw)
      a Facade method, used to perform all the necessary operations to a Word ArrayList
      static java.util.ArrayList<Word> Utility.sort(java.util.ArrayList<Word> a)
      this method is used to sort every Word ArrayList: it checks all the objects and orders them by their counter, in descending order.
      Method parameters in tools with type arguments of type Word 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static java.util.ArrayList<Word> Utility.compute(java.util.ArrayList<Word> raw)
      this method is used to compute every Word ArrayList: it checks all the objects and modify the equal ones, by increasing their counter, modifying the title and the author fields.

      this method establishes an unique ID to every Word object to highlight it and differentiates from each other.

      a Facade method, used to perform all the necessary operations to a Word ArrayList
      static java.util.ArrayList<Word> Utility.sort(java.util.ArrayList<Word> a)
      this method is used to sort every Word ArrayList: it checks all the objects and orders them by their counter, in descending order.
